Thinking category: Focus on the improvement of critical thinking ability, logical deduction ability, decision ability, organizational integration ability, discussion ability and character practice ability.It is hoped that through the cultivation and training of these two aspects, we will develop a brilliant three lives for the future survival, life and life of students.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則，工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康，安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 教授電腦工程繪圖基礎，包括立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖；並能正確標註尺寸，公差與配合，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the basis of computer engineering drawing, including the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views. Learning to mark dimensions, tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarized the drawings of steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices.

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。 冷凍與熱泵系統之熱力循環與實驗。
description.en: Analysis of energy systems, energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance and first law of thermodynamics. Experiments of refrigeration and heat pump cycles.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: 無塵室的應用、無塵室的基本系統、無塵室的基本設計、無塵室節能技術運用、無塵室廠務系統規劃
description.en: Application of clean room, basic structure of a clean room system, fundamental of clean room design, energy saving techniques for clean rooms, planning of clean room factory affairs.

description.zh: 中央空調系統基本設計理念、空調區之熱舒適理論與應用 、空調負荷計算 、風管系統設計、空調系統節能 、特殊空調系統規劃分析
description.en: Basic design concept for central air conditioning system, theory and application of thermal comfort of air condition zone, capacity calculation of air conditioner, piping system design, energy saving of air conditioning systems, planning and analysis of special air conditioning system.

description.zh: 車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工、鑄造、鍛造、鈑金、氣焊及電弧焊等實習。
description.en: Machining, Welding, Casting and Forging Shop Practice.

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 現代性源自於歐洲獨有的歷史文化與社會，在工業化、理性化和民主化的推波助瀾下綻放開來，促使人們從神話、威權和中心性解放出來，擺脫傳統社會的制約。透過現代性的反證精神和批判性概念，歐洲幾乎於整個二十世紀初開展出驚人的物質和人類意識的進程。而建築的生產與整個社會、經濟、政治和審美價值緊密相關的專業，又是如何以自身作為對於現代性的批判？本課程將以辨明現代性概念為主軸，透過阿道夫・魯斯 (Adolf Loos)、西格弗里德・吉迪恩 (Sigfried Giedion)、華特・班雅明 (Walter Benjamin)、恩斯特・布洛赫 (Ernst Bloch)、和威尼斯學派 (Venice School) 的論說作為理解現代性含混而艱澀的觀念，並藉由藝術和建築作品的探索，作為對於現代性的批判與理念的參照，包括前衛派藝術對於建築的衝擊、新巴比倫的城市景觀社會反論、建築的擬仿和批判等等。
description.en: The term “Modernity” originated from the unique European history, culture, and societal condition, bloomed with the development of industrialization, rationalization and democratization. That have inspired human to liberate from mythology, authority and centrality, and get rid of the constraints of traditional society. With the antithesis and critical concepts of modernity, Europe has carried out an amazing progress of material and human consciousness almost throughout the twentieth century. How does architecture as a profession closely related to the entire society, economy, politics, and aesthetic approach, in the process of production implemented itself as a critique of modernity?    In the beginning of the class, it would be most important to identify the concepts of Modernity. The discourses of Adolf Loos, Sigfried Giedion, Walter Benjamin, Ernst Bloch, and the Venetian School help to clarify the vague and difficult concepts of modernity. Through the exploration of art and arc

name.zh: 現代性與建築名作研討
name.en: Seminar on Modernity and Architecture Masterpiece

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊簡介 2. 無線通訊之現況與未來發展 3. 峰巢式行動電話概論 4. 無線傳輸簡介 5. 行動電話之技術 6. 無線通訊系統與標準 7. 衛星行動通訊及其應用 8. 第三代行動通訊重要技術之導論
description.en: 1.Understanding Wireless 2.The Current and Future Developments of Wireless   Communications3.The Cellular Concepts 4.Introduction to Mobile Radio   Propagation 5.Cellular Technologies 6.Wireless Systems and Standards7.Satellits Communications Technology and Its Implementaion 8.The Key Technologies of the Trird Generation Mobile   Communication Systems

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成 - 壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1. 論文閱讀練習    2. 翻訣技巧    3. 技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 物聯網應用介紹、電腦與感測器資訊擷取傳輸、通訊協定與資訊安全
description.en: Introduction to Internet of Things applications, computer and sensor information acquisition and transmission, communication protocols and information security

name.en: Introduction to Internet of Things Applications

description.zh: 稀土是高科技產品必備元素且應用廣泛。本課程主要介紹稀土元素在化工、生物科技、生醫工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米科技、環境工程等諸多領域中的應用。除此，並探討台灣發展稀土產業因應對策。
description.en: Rare earths are essential elements in high-tech products and are widely used. This course mainly introduces the application of rare earth elements in chemical industry, biotechnology, biomedical engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductor, nanotechnology, environmental engineering and many other fields. In addition, countermeasures for the development of Taiwan's rare earth industry will also be discussed.

name.zh: 稀土在化工暨生物科技中的應用
name.en: Application of Rare Earths in Chemical Industry and Biotechnology

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來分析與模擬類比及數位積体電路，進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路的能力，課程內容包念：1. 電腦輔助設計積体電路介紹 2. 類比積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 (SPICE Design center) 3. 數位積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( Viewlogic ) 4. PLD 的認識與介紹 5. FPGA ( Xilinx ) 的設計 6. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore,the student have the design capability of integrated.The contents of this course :1.introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.Introduction to the computer-aided deaign of analysis    integrated circuits(SPICE ,Deaign Center)and computer-  exercise3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits(Viewlogic)and computer-exercise4.Introduction to the PLD5.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise6.Project.

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Integrated Circuits

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用硬體描述語言來分析與設計數位積體電路及系統，進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路的能力，課程內容包括： 1. 電腦輔助設計積體電路介紹 2. 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬介紹 3. 積體電路設計軟體之介紹及使用 (Verilog) 4.FPGA ( Xilinx ) 的設計 5. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use hardware-description language tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore, the student have the design capability of integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.System design using hardware description language 3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits (Verilog) and computer-exercise 4.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise 5.Project

name.zh: 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬
name.en: System Design Using Hardware Description Language

description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程的設計，以科技新創事業的發展為目標，品牌的價值最大化為核心，進而設計與執行品牌之行銷方案，分析如何經營新創品牌的價值，與創造出在新創產業中的優勢品牌與品牌資產。結合行銷學的 STP 模型與 SMART Strategy (睿智策略)，對本地與國際市場上的目標顧客，進行系統化的策略性行銷，連結顧客，經營通路上的成員與學習通路之設計，經由團隊合作，建構起良善通路的競爭優勢。本課程的教學模式，採用國立臺北科大經典的黑手工程師訓練模式，強調動手式的 OJT (On Job Training)。課堂上會有大量的實務型動手演練實作，下課後會有一定數量的作業與練習，透過此系統性訓練課程，將使學員 (學生) 具備微 (小) 型企業 (工作室) 的基本商業維運知識與能力。
description.en: The course is designed to target the development of Innovation Vocation, maximize the value of the brand as the core, and then design and implementation of brand marketing programs, analysis of how to operate a new brand value, and create a cultural industry in the advantages of brand and brand equity. To combine with the STP model of marketing and SMART Strategy, the target customers in the international market, the systematic strategic marketing, linking customers, managing the members in the channel and learning the channel design method. Use teamwork spirit to build the competitive advantage in the commercial channel. The teaching mode of the course: using the Taipei Tech classic Practice-Engineer training model, emphasizing the hands-on OJT (On Job Training) method. There will be a large number of hands-on exercises in the classroom, and a number of homework and exercises. After this course, students will have the basic business model knowledge and ability of micro-enterprises.

name.zh: 科技新創事業與行銷策略
name.en: Technology Innovation Business and Marketing Strategy

description.zh: 本課程將引導學生了解語音辨識在人機互動應用上所牽涉的各種技術，包括語音訊號分析、音素 / 音節辨識、字詞辨識、連續語音辨識、語意辨識、語者辨識、語言辨識、語音合成等，其中也介紹動態時間伸縮與音高比對方法、隱藏式馬可夫模型、類神經網路與深度學習、語者與環境調適、語言模型等方法理論，配合「問題導向學習」之教學模式，進行分組討論、實作練習、企業參訪、與成果觀摩及報告，激發學生之創造與創新能力。
description.en: This course guides students to learn the techniques involved in the human-machine interaction based on speech recognition, including speech signal analysis, phoneme/syllable recognition, word recognition, continuous speech recognition, semantic recognition, speaker recognition, language recognition, speech synthesis. The theoretical fundamentals on dynamic time warping, hidden Markov model, neural network/deep learning, speaker and environment adaptation, language modeling, etc. are also introduced. In addition, the course is designed with the Problem-Based Learning (PBL) method, which includes  group discussion and collaboration on working projects, corporate visit, and project presentation, etc., so that students' capabilities of creativity and innovation can be developed or enhanced.

description.zh: 本課程將講解無人戴具產業發展趨勢，介紹無人戴具通訊系統與網路以及滯空無人戴具裝載無線基地台之空中基地台應用的挑戰，並藉由空對地通道特性與通訊技術應用於無人機的實驗，了解無人載具通訊網路的最佳部署，課程內容包含：(1) 無人戴具系統簡介；(2) 無人飛行載具之點對點傳輸技術 - 軟體無線電實作；(3) 無人戴具空中基站；(4) 無人戴具通訊系統的性能分析 - 空對地通道特性與模型；(5) 無人載具與地面站之 OFDM 傳輸；(6) 無人戴具通訊網路的最佳部署
description.en: This course introduces the development trend of the unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) industry and explains the challenges of UAV communications and networks. With the experiment using air-to-ground channel characteristics, the software-defined radio-based experiment is designed for the transmission of UAVs and ground stations. The course includes: (1) introduction of UAV; (2) point-to-point transmission of UAV based on software-defined radio; (3) performance analysis of UAV systems - air-to-ground channel characteristics and models; (5) OFDM transmission of UAVs and ground stations; (6) optimal network deployment for UAV

name.zh: 結合行動網路之無人戴具通訊技術
name.en: Integrating Unmanned Aerial Vehicle in Mobile Networks

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1. 光電工程概論，2. 基礎光學，3. 電射發光原理，4. 雷射光的調製，5. 光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC 之使用，2. 微電腦學習機之使用，3. 邏輯分析儀之使用，4. 組合語言之設計與除錯，5. 記憶體設計 ROM/RAM，6. 輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7. 輸出入埠應用 (鍵盤介面、LED 顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A 介面設計，9. 簡單 PC 介面卡設計 (PIO 及 SIO) 介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1. 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2. 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3. 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4. 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5. 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis2.Resistve circuit 3.Kirchhoff laws4.Thevenin and Norton theorem5.First and second order circuit6.Node and loop analysis7.Steady state response and analysis8.SPICE tool

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CAD 軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究 (二)

description.zh: 本課程透過介紹基本文法概念及術語促進對於英文表達的系統性了解。課程採用功能 (與認知) 觀點。課程除了涵蓋英語教學語法的基本主題外，也會進行學習困難和偏誤模式的反思討論。此課專為英語為外語之 (未來) 教師設計，幫助他們提升後設語言意識並且發展自己的文法教學計劃。
description.en: The course introduces foundational grammatical concepts and terminology which facilitate a systematic understanding about English expressions from a functional(-cognitive) perspective. Essential topics for English pedagogical grammar will be covered, accompanied with students’ reflection about learning difficulties and patterns of error. The course is designed for prospective and practicing teachers of English as a foreign language to raise their metalinguistic awareness and develop an approach to grammar teaching.

description.zh: 先修課程：4402014 或負責教授同意空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解？水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的 96 家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解？可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 教導學生認識色彩之成因及視覺現象、色彩系統之認識及色彩心理之種種現象。
description.en: Basic understanding about color. Including light, visual perception, color names, color order systems.

description.zh: 讓學生習得 3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、層板家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.

description.zh: 創造家具工業新的工業技術並將銷售與產品體驗統合起來，建立具有適應性、資源效率的智慧型工廠，並在商業流程及價值流程中整合客戶以及商業夥伴，提供完善的服務。
description.en: The creation of new industrial technology and sales experience and product integration furniture industry together to build smart factory adaptable, resource efficiency, and integrate customers and business partners in the business process and value stream, to provide better services.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在學習物流管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 物流管理基本概念、(2) 物流系統設計、(3) 物流資訊科技、(4) 物流運輸作業、(5) 存貨管理、(6) 倉儲作業、(7) 配送作業、(8) 物流委外管理、(9) 全球物流管理、(10) 永續物流管理。
description.en: This course will introduce basic concept and application of logistics management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of logistics management, (2) Logistics system and network design, (3) Logistics information technology, (4) Transportation management, (5) Inventory management, (6) Warehouse management, (7) Distribution management, (8) Logistics outsourcing management, (9) Global logistics management, (10) Sustainable logistics management.

description.zh: 隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
description.en: This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧於企業實務之應用
name.en: Application of Generative Artificial Intelligence in Enterprise Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP 架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP 訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生藉由瞭解市場定位與策略跟科技產品發展與運用的領域有著密不可分的關係。課程內容主要藉由當前科技產品發展的相關課題，以及整體環境的概述，讓同學對於產業或企業之科技產品市場定位與策略有一基本的認知，提供同學從科技產品、市場定位、管理策略的不同角度瞭解科技產品於市場上定位及推動發展策略。
description.en: This course is closely related to the field of technology product development and application through understanding market positioning and strategies. The course content mainly provides students with a basic understanding of the market positioning and strategies of technology products in industries or enterprises through the current topics related to the development of technology products and an overview of the overall environment, and provides students with different perspectives on technology products, market positioning, and management strategies. Understand the positioning of technology products in the market and promote development strategies.

name.zh: 科技產品市場定位與策略
name.en: Technology Products Market Positioning and Strategy

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程的目的是使學生了解數位轉型的方法論與工具，並介紹成功案使學生可以將案例經驗及所學應用於所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to introduce students the methodology and tools for digital transformation. Case studies and experience sharing are provided in this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹資料探勘與大數據分析的理論方法與應用，課程內容涵蓋資料探勘的基本概念，如資料準備、資料探勘的方法與實證、資料探勘的進一步運用，並加入商業等各領域的實務案例介紹，具體說明如何應用資料探勘與大數據分析技術以解決真實問題。另外在工具方面則透過相關分析軟體操作與實作範例輔以說明，讓學生學習資料的準備、工具的應用及分析判斷，透過實作課程，使學生能容易應用資料探勘方法，進而提升大數據分析和數位決策能力。
description.en: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project.The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc.Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，電子商務經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach  how to design the multimedia in the e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域，包含擷取人體的生理參數或用以治療人類疾病。本課程將介紹醫電系統與電子電路的原理，進而介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。主要講解醫療儀器之技術原理與應用，其中包含測量理論、生醫感測器、電極與換能器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器、呼吸治療與肺功能測量、腦神經系統之功能測量與治療，電磁波對醫療電子設備的干擾，以及醫療設備之電氣安全進行說明與探討。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，而非公式的演釋與計算，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field, including capture the body's physiological parameters or for the treatment of human diseases. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. The circuit implementation so that students can experience the practical application of biomedical electronics category. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which include measurement theory, biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment, respiratory therapy and pulmonary function measurement, brain and nerve system function measurement and treatment, electromagnetic interference with medical electronic equipment, and medical equipment electrical safety instructions and discussion. This course

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助高階管理階層作決策。一般而言，這門課為商學課程中的課程主要協助學員們具有整合能力。學員不只是在策略管理中應活學活用，也融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課將幫助您學習、研讀個案和討論，這是此門課的目標。 1. 瞭解組織所處環境 2. 分析外部環境之時機和危機 3. 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 4. 探討企業不同層次之應對策略。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making at the top management level. Traditionally, this course has been the capstone course in the business program and is taught at the last year of study so that students can integrate functional area knowledge into a coherent one. Students are expected not only to learn a body of knowledge on strategic management, but also to synthesize economics, accounting, and marketing as an aid top management level decisions. We will use a combination of readings, case studies, and lectures to achieve the goals of the course.

description.zh: 本課程從品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，由組織在經營的關鍵作用，課程中以品牌與組織理論探討品牌行銷與組織策略的重要議題。課程內容包含品牌權益、品牌行銷、品牌競爭、組織設計、組織權力、組織政治、組織文化。身為公司經營者，面對國際多變化環境中，能做出最佳的品牌行銷與組織經營決策。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of branding marketing and organization strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business markets. The topics covered in this class include: brand equity, brand marketing, brand competition, organization design, organization power, organization polices, organization culture. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best brand and organization decisions under the internationalized and changeable environment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含：社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 病毒可說是介於無生命和有生命之間的物質。它小至用光學顯微鏡看不見除非在電子顯微鏡下。儘管看不見卻無所不在，與人類關係異常密切。人類基因體約 8% 是從病毒來的。目前最難解決的傳染病問題也是由病毒引起。病毒結構看來似乎很簡單，但為了生存也進化出非凡的策略。人類從研究病毒得到非常多重要的知識和研究工具。讓我們能夠對分子、細胞和生物體的結構和功能得到更深地了解，進而對疾病問題得到解決。本課程將以深入簡出的方式讓同學認識病毒：從病毒的起源，病毒如何進入宿主細胞與複製，並在宿主群體間存活和傳播所必須具備的機制。通過一系列較具代表性的人類病毒為例子進行介紹病毒複製的基礎、人類與病毒的相互作用以及如何導致疾病。同時認識人體 4006 的疫系統如何對抗病毒。了解為什麼新興病毒的出現並造成疫情。人類應如何應對。最後介紹兩種不尋常的傳染因子 - 類病毒和狂牛病蛋白。它們與病毒似乎都是在生命起源中在化學演化時期殘留下來的分子。
description.en: This course will emphasize the mechanisms necessary for the virus to successfully enter and reproduce in the host cell, and survive and spread in the host population. Through a series of representative examples of human viruses, I will introduce the general basis of virus replication, the interaction between the virus and the host, and how these factors cause diseases and our immune system against virus. Finally, I will briefly introduce two unusual infectious agents- viroid and prion.

name.en: An introduction to virology and unusual infectious agents

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 國際能源署 (IEA) 呼籲全球國家訂定淨零碳排路徑，國內也啟動淨零目標期程與行動方案，針對建築部門，建築能效評估系統 (Building energy efficiency rating system, TBERS) 為因應亞熱帶氣候與空間複合化、多樣化建築特性所量身訂做的簡易有效評估工具。為使學生培養永續淨零概念並具備建築能效評估計算、評分與標示之技術能力，具體目標如下:。1. 了解國內外淨零碳排路徑策略 2. 評估新建建築、既有建築能效等級 3. 操作新建建築、既有建築之近零設計策略 4. 綜合分析與歸納建築能效機制
description.en: IEA (The International Energy Agency) proposes to set a global net carbon emission roadmap, and domestically launch a net target and action plan, targeting the building sector, the Building Energy Efficiency Rating System (TBERS) a simple and effective assessment tool tailored for subtropical climate and spatial complex and diverse building characteristics. This course aims at develop the concept of sustainable net zero and have the technical ability of building energy efficiency assessment calculation, scoring and marking, the specific goals are as follows:1. Understand domestic and foreign net zero carbon emission path strategies2. Evaluate the energy efficiency rating of new buildings and existing buildings3. Operate the nearly-zero design strategy of new buildings and existing buildings4. Conclude the analysis and induction of building energy efficiency mechanism

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解各種不同的資訊科技 (Information Technology) 與管理資訊系統間的關連性，並結合金融企業導入產業議題，實際應用所教授的 IT 技術進行學術研究。藉由 IT 技術的應用演練，讓學生將實際進行問題分析、模型發展、系統開發、模擬實驗及最後的研究結論與模型驗證。提升學生獨立思考與解決問題之能力，培養科學的態度與學術研究的知識。
description.en: This course is to enable students to understand the relationship between various Information Technology and management information systems, and cooperate with financial companies to introduce industrial topics, and actually apply the IT technology taught for academic research. Through the application and exercise of IT technology, students will actually carry out problem analysis, model development, system development, and simulation experiments. At last, students can summarize research conclusions and model validation. Thus, students can improve their independent thinking and problem-solving ability, and further cultivate their scientific attitude and academic research knowledge.

name.zh: 金融教育分析與邏輯思維
name.en: Financial education analytics and logical thinking

description.zh: 「新興支付應用暨產業發展」是一門探討現今支付產業趨勢的課程，課程內容包括了第三方電子支付、行動支付、跨領域支付應用、先買後付（Buy Now Pay Later, BNPL）及加密貨幣支付等。同時課程也會探討其產業發展脈絡、業者策略及監管等相關議題
description.en: This course explores current payment industry trends. The course content includes third-party electronic payments, mobile payments, cross-domain payment applications, Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), and encrypted currency payments. At the same time, the course will also explore related issues such as industry development context, operator strategies, and regulation.

name.zh: 新興支付應用暨產業發展
name.en: Emerging Payment Applications and Industry Development

description.zh: 瞭解資料庫安全運作基本概念，熟悉資料庫系統安全各項技巧，奠定學生學習分散式動態資料庫系統之管理與安全能力。並配合範例及實務演練，培養實際進階應用能力。
description.en: Understand the basic concepts of database security operation, familiarise yourself with database system security techniques, and lay the foundation for students to learn the management and security capabilities of distributed dynamic database systems. And cooperate with examples and practical exercises to cultivate advanced practical application ability.

description.zh: 本課程將從不同的金融服務領域應用幫助同學瞭解數位金融的發展以及生成式 AI 於金融科技之應用。本課程之教學目標包括：(1) 人工智慧跨域應用金融產品企劃與數位行銷：掌握虛擬通路與實體通路的差異與整合應用，導入通用式人工智慧搭配合適的使用者介面與體驗設計；(2) 智慧金融科技素養與創新應用：關注大數據、雲端運算、物聯網與人工智慧的各種創新應用，並了解機器學習於資金管理之應用與人工智慧於量化交易之應用；(3) 生成式 AI 導入與開發：透過課程整合微軟 Azure Open AI 雲端服務資源，讓學生具有導入 ChatGPT 及聊天機器人開發能力，並連結創新創業課程建立明確創業目標，導入跨領域創業課程，養成專業職能和研發實力，進而了解金融產業在數位轉型中，所面臨的困難與挑戰。
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	This course will help students understand the development of digital finance and the application of generative AI in financial technology from different financial service applications. The objectives of this program include: (1) Financial product planning and digital marketing; (2) Intelligent financial technology literacy and innovative applications; (3) Generative AI Introduction and Development: Integrate Microsoft Azure Open AI cloud service resources through the course to provide students with the ability to introduce ChatGPT and chat robot development, and link to innovative entrepreneurship courses to establish clear entrepreneurial goals and introduce cross-disciplinary entrepreneurship courses to develop professional functions and R&D capabilities.

name.zh: 人工智慧跨域金融之應用

description.zh: 物聯網系統包含了感測器與感測網路，邊緣閘道，雲端服務與存取裝置，可建構眾多的端到端商業應用包含無人商店與智慧支付的場景金融，遠距醫療與照護，智慧製造與智慧家庭等。本課程將教授物聯網系統的設計包含裝置與服務的技術，並以各項商業應用場景做課題的探討。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) system encompasses sensors and sensor networks, IoT gateways, cloud services, and mobile devices, enabling the development of numerous end-to-end business applications, including scenarios such as unmanned stores, and intelligent payment in the financial sector, remote healthcare and caregiving, smart manufacturing, and smart homes. This course will teach the design of IoT systems, including device and service technologies, and explore various business application scenarios as topics of discussion.

name.zh: 物聯網系統設計與商業應用
name.en: IoT System design and Business Application

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程將使 EMBA 學生了解數位轉型與優化相關趨勢，並透過一些成功案例探討數位轉型對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA 學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest digital transformation issues and potential benefits to enterprise. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

name.zh: 企業數位轉型與優化研討

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 資訊管理是整合策略，使用者和組織系統，用以提供一個組織之管理分析和決策，幫助高階主管滿足組織目標，以及了解資訊科技。學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢、透過資訊系統應用，支持管理和執行、發展資訊科技應用、獲得競爭優勢。全課程以哈佛個案研討方式進行
description.en: The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. Information management function provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning: Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems. Supporting managers and executives through IS applications. Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications. Attaining and practicing technological leadership. This course is taught by HBS cases.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中圖形識別的基本原理與相關技術，使學生了解各種圖形識別的分類方法，經由對分類問題的分析，瞭解如何將輸入樣本依不同特性加以分類，並熟悉圖形識別系統之相關議題如：分割、特徵擷取、分類、後處理、訓練、監督 / 非監督式學習、機器學習，進而了解分類問題，增進其解決實際圖形識別分類問題的能力。課程內容包括下列課題：圖形識別概論，Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood, 非參數法學習，K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Positive Boolean Function 多分類器，Linear Discriminant Functions，高維資料分類，分類正確率評估 (Accuracy Assessments) 及其他重要的應用，例如：文件分析、生物辨識、影像監控、遙測影像分類、醫療診斷、資料探勘等概念，最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，了解近代圖形識別的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Introduction to Pattern Recognition, Bayesian Decision Theory, Maximum-Likelihood & Bayesian Parameter Estimation, Non-Parametric Classification - Density Estimation, K-Nearest Neighbor Estimation, The Nearest-Neighbor Rule, Multi-Classifier - Positive Boolean Function, Linear Discriminant Functions, Pattern Recognition of High Dimensional Data Sets, Pattern Recognition for Remote Sensing Images, Biometric Certification, Video Surveillance, Accuracy Assessments and Other Related Topics.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: English Description	Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利。課程內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。
description.en: The objectives of this course are to learn the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes Concepts and Context of CRM, Consumer Behavior, Customer data mining, CRM system, Planning and management of CRM projects, Performance Measurement of CRM, Customer Relationship Management :Practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討因應產業環境變化下，企業經營模式之變革。 經營模式變革中，如何創新經營模式？是本課程主題。課中除了基本經營模式方法論外，產業個案教材是其重點。個案教材之課程進行將採哈佛大學個案教學方式實施。
description.en: This course aims to investigate the transformation of the business model, under the changes in the industrial environment. During business model transformation, how to innovate the business model Is the theme of this course. In addition to the basic business model methodology, the lesson will cover industry case materials. Case teaching materials into the curriculum will be taken to implement by the Harvard University case teaching way.

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

description.zh: 現代人工作壓力大，許多上班族都有壓力、失眠、焦慮等問題。醫學也發現，身體許多疾病甚至癌症也都和情緒、壓力有關。目前，已經證實正念減壓：可以降低壓力與焦慮，疲勞，降低員工的職業倦怠程度和離職率。提升睡眠品質，增強疫系統，提升專注力，提高領導效能，提升大腦功能與創造力，促進幸福感。滿意度，情緒管理能力、創造力、與人際溝通能力，提高工作績效。改善了個人健康、工作與家庭生活！因此，目前歐美和國內的各大企業紛紛引入正念課程，以提高員工和企業績效。
description.en: There are so many people with the high stress in the workplace. It’s demonstrated that practicing mindfulness can bring improvements in both physical and psychological symptoms as well as positive changes in health, attitudes, and behaviors. The advantages of integrating mindfulness in the workplace including:higher brain functioning;reduced work-related stress, anxiety, depression, fatigue, and psychological distress .Improves job performance, greater job satisfaction, and decreasing turnover and burnout.

name.en: Mindfulness for Leadership and Stress Reduction

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵，以配合企業整體競爭策略與形式。其內容有：人力資源分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬、人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course introduce how to apply the resource of the inter-corporation and employee, such as capacity, knowledge, technology, attitude and incentive, in order to cooperate business integrate competitive strategy.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課程主要分為專利權的觀念建立，及並以自然語言處理（NLP）作為主要工具，專利權進行量化分析。專利權部份：壹、保護創新：1. 如何透過專利保護科技創新、2. 專利的迷思。貳、專利與創新：1. 如何由需求或靈感取得創新、2. 如何使創新轉化為實質專利 3. 如何從專利撰寫演化出創新。參、專利概念與規法：1. 我國專利體系介紹、2. 專利相關法規之介紹、3. 專利取得的流程、4. 發明專利實體審查基、5. 專利說明書及圖示的撰寫格式、6. 何謂發明單一性及優先權的使用。肆、專利說明書搜尋及閱讀：1. 各國專利的搜尋引擎、2. 專利工具的使用、3. 閱讀專利說明書。伍、專利說明書的撰寫與申請：1. 專利說明書撰寫之重要 2. 專利說明書之格式 3. 專利說明書之撰寫技巧。陸、專利戰略與佈局：1. 商戰專利佈局模式、2. 專利舉發實務、3. 專利舉發方式、4. 專利舉發程序、5. 專利舉發策略運用、6. 舉發撤銷要件。柒、專利侵害及訴訟實例：1. 從案例中學習專利侵害的攻防與法院訴訟的爭點、2. 專家演講 (法官，技審官，審查官，律師) 邀請領域的專家分享實務經驗。專利權數據部份：壹、專利數據收集：深入探討數據清理，篩選，確保學生能夠為分析準備適當的數據集
description.en: Patent-related aspects include:1.	Protecting Innovation: Learn how to protect technological innovations through patents and debunk common myths surrounding patents.2.	Patent and Innovation: Understand how to derive innovation from demands or inspirations, turn innovations into substantial patents, and evolve innovations from patent writing.3.	Patent Concepts and Laws: Get introduced to the patent system in our country, learn about related regulations, understand the process of acquiring a patent, delve into invention patent review basics, and learn the format of writing patent specifications and illustrations. Furthermore, understand what constitutes an invention's singularity and the use of priority rights.4.	Searching and Reading Patent Specifications: Get accustomed to search engines of patents across various countries and patent tools, and learn how to read patent specifications.5.	Writing and Applying Patent Specifications: Understand the importance of patent specificati

description.zh: 課程內容包括：生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development and guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 戰略管理使用綜合管理視角去解決相關的制定和實施企業和企業級戰略的問題。該課程包括開發識別問題的能力，評估戰略選擇，並瞭解戰略的形成和執行的組織過程。它建立在功能區課程所獲得的知識，並使用案例研究和項目，以提高學生的分析和決策能力。前提：必須參與上學期的課程或與得到研究生導師的許可。
description.en: Strategic management uses a general management perspective in addressing issues related to the formulation and implementation of corporate and business level strategy. The course involves developing the ability to identify issues, evaluate strategic options and understand the organizational process by which strategies get formed and executed. It builds on the knowledge gained in functional area courses and uses case studies and projects to improve students' analytical and decision-making skills. Prerequisite: Must be taken in last semester or with permission of the Graduate Advisor.

description.zh: 本課程將從基礎深度學習理論、邊緣智慧硬體應用、資料集建置、客製化模型訓練到推論環境佈署，讓學員透過 Google Colab, Intel OpenVINO, OpenCV 等開源工具，學習如何規畫及實踐不同類型的低功耗、低延時、低成本及高隱私的邊緣智慧應用專案。
description.en: This course will cover basic deep learning theory, edge smart hardware application, data set construction, customized model training, and inference environment deployment. Allowing students to learn how to plan and practice types of edge smart application with low power consumption, low latency, low cost, and high privacy features.

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

description.zh: 本課程旨在深入介紹統計技術和最佳化概念，藉以輔助管理之決策。課程涵蓋統計學及最佳化相關主題，包括描述性統計、相關分析、抽樣和估計、概率分布、假設檢驗、回歸模型、實驗設計和線性規劃。通過課程學生還將獲得統計和最佳化軟件（如 LINGO 和 Excel）的實際操作經驗。修習課程之學生將具備應用統計和最佳化工具處理實務問題之技能和知識，使其能夠基於數量方法之做出決策及管理。
description.en: This course aims to offer an in-depth understanding of statistical techniques and optimization concepts for making informed management decisions. The course provides a comprehensive overview of key topics in statistics, including descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, sampling and estimation, probability distributions, hypothesis testing, regression models, design of experiments, and linear programming. Students will also gain practical experience in statistical and optimization software such as LINGO and Excel through interactive tutorials. On completion of this course, students would be able to equip with the skills and knowledge needed to apply statistical and optimization tools to real-life situations, allowing them to make informed decisions based on quantitative methods.

description.zh: 該課程強調關鍵的經濟和商業概念（包括對需求和供應，生產，成本和利潤的分析；市場支配力；戰略行為和定價；國際貿易理論）影響決策。
description.en: The course emphasizes key economic and business concepts(including analysis of demand and supply, production, cost, and profit; market power, strategic behavior, and pricing; international trade theories) that influence decisions.

description.zh: 本課程將使用時下最新生成式人工智慧工具介紹人工智慧原理及其於大數據分析及智慧計算之應用，進行數據預處理，建立並優化訓練模型。課程內容包括監控生產線上各種數據，如產品品質、生產效率等。通過即時警報和提示，幫助管理人員快速識別並解決問題。藉由學習和分析過往的故障記錄和維修日誌，預測和診斷產設備，提供相應的維護建議。幫助企業實現定期維護和檢修，從而減少設備故障率和生產停機時間。進行自動識別和分類缺陷，並提供改進建議，從而提高產品品質和生產效率。
description.en: This course makes use of the state-of-the-art (SOTA) tools of generative artificial intelligence (AI) to introduce the principles of artificial intelligence and its applications in big data, including data preprocessing, model building, and AI model hyper-parameterization. The course focuses on various types of production-related data. By monitoring shop floor real-time data, production engineers may quickly identify and resolve abnormalities. By learning and analyzing past failure records and maintenance logs, the system may predict and diagnose production errors and provide predictive schedules for equipment maintenance. It helps companies to find a better balance between equipment failure occurrence and production scheduled downtime. The course includes applications in automatic pattern identification, recognition, and classification to assist decision-makers in improving product quality and production efficiency.

name.zh: 人工智慧跨域大數據分析之應用
name.en: AI Applications in Big Data Analytics

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在學習智慧營運管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 智慧營運管理基本概念、(2) 大數據分析與營運管理、(3) 人工智慧與營運管理、(4) 物聯網與營運管理、(5) 智慧製造與營運管理、(6) 智慧物流管理、(7) 智慧供應鏈管理、(8) 智慧生產規劃與排程、(9) 永續營運管理。
description.en: This course will introduce basic concept and application of advanced operation management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of intelligent operations management, (2) Big data analytic and operations management, (3) Artificial intelligence and operations management, (4) IoT and operations management, (5) Smart manufacturing and operations management, (6) Intelligent logistic management, (7) Intelligent supply chain management, (8) Intelligent production planning and scheduling, (9)Sustainable operations management.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1. 簡介；2. 電子商店的行銷策略；3. 電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6. 案例介紹；7. 結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

description.zh: 此課程旨在以使用者為中心的觀點，說明產品與服務之開發與設計相關概念，並以實作方式應用使用者研究的方法，收集、分析與呈現研究資料與成果，使學生具備使用者研究的執行與發表能力。
description.en: From the human-centered perspective, this course explains concepts about the development and design of products and services. By practicing user research methods, students will learn how to collect and analyze the data, and present the findings of user research.

description.zh: 這門課程主要是討論人工智慧 (AI) 的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含：1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧） 2. 知識表示的方法 3. AI 程式語言：LISP 與 PROLOG  4. 推論方法 5. 進階研究主題
description.en: This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following : 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving

description.zh: 資料科學為最熱門的職業之一，各行各業對於數據分析的人才需求正在蓬勃發展，本課程在於培育從事資料科學或機器學習的人員來發展相關知識和技能。課程內容以線性代數、機率、統計學等工程數學為理論學習基礎，操作 Python 作為資料科學的實作工具，包括其相關 Python 基礎語法、各種資料型態、數據 可視化、開源工具等。接著學習利用 Python 取得數據資料，進而操作各種迴歸 分析來手動分析數據資料，並實作梯度遞減，決策樹等最佳化演算方法。最後則是介紹機器學習、深度學習等最新的 AI 演算方法來分析大數據並輔助決策。
description.en: Data Science has been ranked as one of the hottest professions and the demand for data practitioners is booming. This course is designed to develop people engaged in data science or machine learning to develop relevant knowledge and skills. You will understand how data science works based on mathematics, such as linear algebra, probability and statistics. Python is the best tool to learn how to conduct data science analyze data. Learn the basic language skills, common data types, visualization tools and extended modules for data grabbing and regression analysis. Gradient decent and decision tree for optimization will be covered. Finally, AI algorithm, machine learning, and deep learning, are introduced how data help in decision making.

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構，能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。 本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在 Hadoop 生態系統中，以 Cloudera Hadoop 為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。 課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop 硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹 Hadoop 認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

description.zh: 該課程強調關鍵的經濟和商業概念（包括對需求和供應，生產，成本和利潤的分析；市場支配力；戰略行為和定價；國際貿易理論）影響決策。
description.en: The course emphasizes key economic and business concepts(including analysis of demand and supply, production, cost, and profit; market power, strategic behavior, and pricing; international trade theories) that influence decisions.

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC 之使用，2. 微電腦學習機之使用，3. 邏輯分析儀之使用，4. 組合語言之設計與除錯，5. 記憶體設計 ROM/RAM，6. 輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7. 輸出入埠應用 (鍵盤介面、LED 顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A 介面設計，9. 簡單 PC 介面卡設計 (PIO 及 SIO) 介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹期貨、選擇權與相關衍生性金融商品的理論基礎與實務概念，了解衍生性金融商品在套利、避險與投機策略上的應用。課程內容包含期貨與選擇權兩個部分：在期貨議題方面，主要介紹期貨市場的組織結構、期貨契約的理論價格、以及避險策略；在選擇權議題方面，則是涵蓋選擇權市場的介紹、選擇權的理論價格、交易策略、與市場資訊分析。藉由對期貨與選擇權理論基礎的建構，期望能強化同學對於衍生性金融商品的實務應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to the theoretical and practical aspects of financial futures, options, and other derivatives. Derivatives have become one of the most important tools of modern finance, from both the academic and the practical standpoint. They are used for compensation, speculation, yield enhancements of investments, and, most importantly, for risk management. This course consists of two parts. The first part of the course deals with futures issues including the structure of futures markets, pricing of futures contracts, and hedging with such contracts. The second part of the course deals with options issues including options markets, strategies, pricing, and hedging analysis. Students will learn about the theoretical underpinnings and the practical applications in real world of derivative securities.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

description.zh: 內容包括機械性質測試、延性與脆性破壞、疲勞、腐蝕、磨耗、氫脆，及金屬加工、鑄造、熱處理、焊接等缺陷等探討。
description.en: The contents include mechanical testing、ductile and brittle fracture、fatigue、corrosion、wear、hydrogen degradation，and deal with metal working defects、casting defects、heat treatment defects、welding defects。

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於 320 小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占 50%，輔導老師占 50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習 18 週，每週不得低於 2.5 天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用暑假至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業企業之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the ing related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於 320 小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占 50%，輔導老師占 50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期到工業工程與管理相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習 4.5 月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the industrial engineering and management related fields in one of the corporative industrial engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative industrial engineering and management company full-time at least 4.5 months.

name.zh: 工業安全衛生管理實務
